content.en: Meta-optimization: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms to optimize the design of metasurfaces in order to reduce radar cross section (RCS). These metasurfaces, made up of tiny elements, can potentially make objects less detectable by radar. Algorithms such as genetic algorithms, particle swarm optimization, and evolutionary algorithms are being used to find the best arrangement and coding sequence for these metasurfaces, allowing for wideband and broadband RCS reduction.
content.da: Meta-optimering: Forskere undersøger anvendelsen af algoritmer til at optimere designet af metasurface for at reducere radar tværsnitsareal (RCS). Disse metasurface, der består af små elementer, kan potentielt gøre objekter mindre opdages af radar. Algoritmer som genetiske algoritmer, partikel-sværm optimering og evolutionære algoritmer anvendes til at finde den bedste arrangement og kodningssekvens for disse metasurface, hvilket tillader bredbånds- og bredspektrum RCS-reduktion.
